nodes.text: Rodian theater was a type of theater performian in the Rodian tongue. The Rodian Harido Kavila created works of Rodian theater that were well-liked by the Anomid Jedi High Council member Alxa Kress, and Kress taught Jedi Master Mace Windu how to perform Kavila's works in Rodese.

The Rodian theater first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 adventure book Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure, written by Cavan Scott. The theater was first introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 1996 West End Games roleplaying adventure A Trip to the Country, published in the sourcebook Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide.
